渻字的基本解释

渻
shěng
古同“省”，减少。
水门。
姓。

渻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shěng］
［《廣韻》所景切，上梗，生。］
［《廣韻》息井切，上静，心。］
(1)“省”的古字。减少。
(2)姓。春秋时有渻灶。见《左传·襄公三十一年》。

渻字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渻； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页635第18
【唐韻】息幷切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】息井切，?音省。【說文】少減也。一曰水門，一曰水名。　又丘名。【爾雅·釋丘】水出其前曰渻丘。　又姓。【左傳】有渻竈。　又【唐韻】所景切【集韻】所省切，?音眚。義同。

考證：〔又姓。【左傳】有省竈。〕　謹據襄三十一年左傳原文省竈改渻竈。
渻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
渻字的起名意思

暂无。

渻
Basic explanation of words
渻
shěng
In ancient times, "province" is reduced.
Watergate.
name.
渻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shěng］
["Guangyun" scene cut, top stem, raw. ]
["Guangyun" Xijing cuts, on the quiet, the heart. ]
(1) The ancient word for "province". cut back.
(2) Last name. There is Lu Stove in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Thirty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Gong".
渻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　渻; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 635 Page 18
【Tang Yun】Cut and cut 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】Cut well, save sound. [Said the text] It is also reduced. One is the water gate, and the other is the name of the water.　Also the name of the hill. 【Erya·Shiqiu】Before the water flows out, it is called Luqiu.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan] There is Lu Zha.　 and [Tang Yun] cut from the scene [Ji Yun] cut from the province,? Sound. The same meaning. Textual research: [Another surname. [Zuo Zhuan] Save the stove. 〕 　 According to the original Zuo Zhuan in the 31st year of Xiang Xiang, the stove was changed to Lu stove.
